שליטה מרחוק זמינה!
---------------------

1. ודא שהשרת רץ (remote-server.js).
2. פתח את הדפדפן באייפון/טלפון והזן:
   http://<ip-local>:3017/command
3. שלח פקודות (POST) או השתמש בכלי מותאם.

* ניתן לסרוק QR שיוצג באפליקציה במחשב.
* כל פקודה תרוץ במחשב ותציג תוצאה.

דוגמה ל-curl:
curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"command":"dir"}' http://<ip-local>:3017/command

אזהרת אבטחה:
- אל תפעיל את השרת ברשת ציבורית/אינטרנט פתוח!
- מומלץ להפעיל רק ברשת הביתית.
- אין כרגע סיסמה/אימות – כל מי שמחובר לרשת יכול לשלוח פקודות.

Remote Control Available!
-------------------------

1. Make sure the server is running (remote-server.js).
2. To set a password: create a file named remote-password.txt with your password, or set REMOTE_PASS environment variable.
3. Open your phone browser and go to:
   http://<local-ip>:3017/command
4. Send commands (POST) or use any compatible tool. You must include the password!

* You can scan the QR shown in the desktop app.
* Every command will run on your computer and output will be shown.

Example curl with password:
curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "X-Remote-Pass: 1234" -d '{"command":"dir"}' http://<local-ip>:3017/command

Or in POST body:
{
  "command": "dir",
  "password": "1234"
}

Security Warning:
- Do NOT run this server on a public/open network!
- Recommended for home LAN only.
- Password/auth now required for all remote commands.

-------------------------
File Upload/Download:
-------------------------

Upload file from phone/PC to computer:
curl -X POST -H "X-Remote-Pass: 1234" -F "file=@myfile.txt" http://<local-ip>:3017/upload

Download file from computer to phone/PC:
curl -X GET -H "X-Remote-Pass: 1234" "http://<local-ip>:3017/download?filename=<server-filename>"

Delete file from uploads folder:
curl -X DELETE -H "X-Remote-Pass: 1234" "http://<local-ip>:3017/delete?filename=<server-filename>"

List all files in uploads folder:
curl -X GET -H "X-Remote-Pass: 1234" "http://<local-ip>:3017/list"

- The result is a JSON array of files: [{ filename, mtime }], newest first.
- Only files in the uploads folder can be deleted.
- The filename is the name returned from upload (field: filename).
- You can also use the original name for your own tracking.
